forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 71. South wind around 21 mph, with gusts as high as 46 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Chance Showers And Thunderstorms then Rain
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of showers and thunderstorms before 8pm, then rain. Cloudy. Low around 49, with temperatures rising to around 56 overnight. South wind 13 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 35 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New rainfall amounts between a quarter and half of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain. Cloudy. High near 56, with temperatures falling to around 43 in the afternoon. Southwest wind around 16 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%. New rainfall amounts between a tenth and quarter of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Sunday Night

forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain before 8pm. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 27. Northwest wind 9 to 14 mph, with gusts as high as 23 mph. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

New snow accumulation of 3 to 7 inches possible.

sections.header: Stony Creek Cross Country Ski Rental:
sections.content: Cross Country Ski center closed for the season.

Nubs Nob (Harbor Springs).conditions: Nubs has plenty of coverage , depth , and groom on the upper loops. The sweet spot between hard and soft was 10:30 to 1:00. A little bit of wind debris , but not an issue . LF 8 rilled

nubsNob.liftsOpen: At least 7 Lifts, Rope Tow and Space Worm
nubsNob.xcTrails: Trails are soft today. Expect bare spots especially on the lower trails.
nubsNob.comments: Happy Mardi Gras! It's a warm and windy day for the Mardi Gras celebration. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM today. Expect to find soft spring snow on the slopes. Coverage and snow depth on the majority of the terrain is still very good. A few highlights today will be the Steel Drum band at noon, The Soaker Cup at 2:30 PM, and Pete Kehoe with Michelle Chenard in the Winter Garden at 3:30 PM. Pintail Peak Lodge is open today. Come celebrate spring on slopes with all of the WILD ANIMALS here at Nub's Nob.
